name: Sky Climb (Pierre Baudoin)
description:
Run on the wall by pressing the straf button (Q/D) while sticking to it. White is safe, yellow circles are checkpoints. Follow the arrows and cross the finish line as fast as possible.

I advice you to use AZERTY keyboard, no controller keys.

Credit : 

Julien ALESSANDRI : Game concept, game design, sound design
https://www.linkedin.com/in/julien-alessandri-219aa9158/

Pierre BAUDOIN : Level design and programming
https://www.linkedin.com/in/pierre-baudoin-a6ab84153/

Game made and presented during our master degree at ICAN (Paris) : 1 month project
